name: Block Smasher - 3D Arcade Action Reaction Brick Breaker Game
name_original: Block Smasher - 3D Arcade Action Reaction Brick Breaker Game
description:
### Block Smasher 3D Game - Action & Reaction

Don't miss it!

Block Smasher is a fun, easy to play, addictive brain teaser break out style 3D game.

More than just entertainment, it’s designed to improve your concentration and mental ability to do successful strategies to move up to next level.

Block Smasher is a compelling board game for all ages including kids and teenagers in which the player must smash/hit a wall of blocks or bricks by deflecting a bouncing fire ball with a paddle.

The paddle move horizontally (left or right) and is controlled by keyboard arrow keys. When all the bricks or blocks have been destroyed, play advances to a new level.

As they move up to higher level, it's harder to hit the specially arranged blocks to gain high scores. You are allowed to use specific number of life's throughout out the game.

Features:
✓ 5 Unique levels from easy to hard
✓ Beat your own high score with reset option.
✓ Charming background music and sound effects will please you during the game play.
✓ Use key board controls to move the paddle left or right.
✓ Break as many blocks as you can and make a high score.
✓ More levels to come soon.
